item.title: Here are all the Trump tariffs hitting the economy in the coming weeks
item.description: The president’s announcement led to fears that he won’t just be using the threat of new tariffs as a negotiating tool, but as lasting policy.

item.title: What Warren Buffett really thinks about the stock market
Tesla’s stock skid pushes valuation below $1 trillion for the first time in 3 months
item.description: Tesla’s closing market cap slides below $1 trillion for the first time since mid-November.
